owl:Ontology.dc:description: An ontology that describes the Generic Feature Format Version 3 (GFF3) by Lincoln Stein (http://www.sequenceontology.org/resources/gff3.html), the General Transfer Format (GTF) by various contributors (http://mblab.wustl.edu/GTF22.html), the Genome Variation Format Version 1 (GVF) by Karen Eilbeck, Paul Flicek, Gabor Marth, Martin Reese, Lincoln Stein and Mark Yandell (http://www.sequenceontology.org/resources/gvf.html), and the Variant Call Format (VCF) by Petr Danecek, Adam Auton, Goncalo Abecasis, Cornelis A. Albers, Eric Banks, Mark A. DePristo, Robert E. Handsaker, Gerton Lunter, Gabor T. Marth, Stephen T. Sherry, Gilean McVean, Richard Durbin and the 1000 Genomes Project Analysis Group (http://vcftools.sourceforge.net/specs.html). The ontology was inspired by previous work of Robert Hoehndorf's RDF2OWL (http://code.google.com/p/rdf2owl).
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Genomic Feature and Variation Ontology (GFVO)
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Joachim Baran

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: attribute method
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Further information about the associated attribute(s).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: attributes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Tag name/value pair attributes of a feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: breakpoint
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Potential source or destination of zero-length sequence alterations.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: breakpoint object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Breakpoint class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: chromosome
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Denotes abstract chromosome representations for capturing variants that appear on the same chromosome of a polyploid organism.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship that describes which features belong to a feature set.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: data source
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Data source origin of the feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: data type
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Datatype of this data source.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: datasource object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with DataSource class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dbxref
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A database cross-reference to associate a feature or its structured pragma metadata to a representation in another database.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: effect
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An effect of a particular feature variant.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: effect object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Effect class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: feature object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Feature class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: feature ontology
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Explicit link-out to one or more ontologies that have been used for describing features. This is a meta comment about the URIs that link out to SO/SOFA or other ontologies.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: feature type
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A term that is describing the sequence feature that is being affected.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: genomic source
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Denotes the source of genomic data (on a cell-type level).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: genotype
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Determines the genotype as observed in an individual.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: individual
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links to information about an individual.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: locus
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: FALDO "Region" instance replacement for a feature's start, stop, strand properties.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: ontology term
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A cross-reference to an ontology term that is associated with a feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: parent
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link out to the parent feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: phenotype description
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Further information about an individual's phenotype. Applies only to single individual sets.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: read type
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Types of reads produced by the platform.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reference
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specific information about the reference sequence of a feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: score method
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Used scoring method.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: seqid
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Establishes the landmark (e.g. a chromosome) on which a feature or breakpoint is located.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sequence variant
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Effect of a sequence alteration on a sequence feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sequenced individual object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with SequencedIndividual class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: set object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Set class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sex
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Denotes the sex of the sequenced individual for single-individual sets.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: source method
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Further information about the algorithm/methodologies used.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: species
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: NCBI Taxonomy Ontology "NCBITaxon_1" (or sub-classes) instance that denotes the species for a feature set.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: structured attributes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Tag name/value pair attributes that are not captured by the GVF specification.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifies the target that the features aligns to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: target attribute method
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Further information about the associated attribute(s).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: target property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Target class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: technology platform
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Technology platform that was used to derive the feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: technology platform property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with TechnologyPlatform class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: variant
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specific information about the variant(s) of a feature.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: variant object property
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Variant class instances.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: zygosity
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Zygosity of a variant.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: 3' context
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Sequence context (positive strand) of a feature on the 3' end.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: 5' context
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Sequence context (positive strand) of a feature on the 5' end.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: alias
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Secondary name of a feature, which can be HGVS/ISCN nomenclature names, but not cross-references to databases (e.g. dbSNP, OMIM) which should use the dbxref property.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: amino acid
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Amino acid in the reference genome that overlaps with a variant's genome coordinates. Amino acid that overlaps with the variant.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: average coverage
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Undocumented in GVF specification.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: build
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a genome assembly build that denotes the provenance of features in a feature set. For example, 'NCBI 36' or 'FlyBase r4.1'.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: codon
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the codon from the reference sequence whose coordinates overlap with this variant. Describes the codon that overlaps this variant.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: comment
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A free text note. Should be replaced with "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#comment".

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: effect datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Effect class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: feature
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Features that are affected by this sequence alteration effect. This can be an external feature identifier, such as an Ensembl gene/transcript identifier.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: feature datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Feature class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: file date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Creation date of the file that this set stems from.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: file version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Version of the GVF file that this set stems from.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: frequency
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Frequency of a variant in a population.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gff version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Version of the GFF specification that defines the feature set contents apart from GVF related definitions.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gtf version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Version of the GTF specification that defines the feature set contents.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: gvf version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Version of the GVF specification that defines the feature set contents.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: id
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the feature within the feature set.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is circular
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes whether a feature is circular or not.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is phased
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether this particular is phased. Used to encode ##phased-genotypes statements.Also a property of a GVF variant, but the specification is unclear on exact details.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: landmark datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Landmark class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a feature, which can be used for display purposes. The name is not a unique property among features.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: note
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A free text note. Should be replaced with "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#comment".

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: phase
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Phase of the feature, if it is a CDS. Called "frame" in GTF.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: phred score
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A phred-scaled quality score for the reference seuence; -10log_10 prob(no variant). A phred-scaled quality score for a variant sequence; -10log_10 prob(variant call is wrong). High scores indicate high confidence calls. This is a property associated with VCF data.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: platform class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of technology used to gather the variant data. Unrestricted range due to open specification.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: platform name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Sequencer or other machine used to collect the variant data. Unrestricted range due to open specification.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: read length
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Undocumented in GVF specification.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: read pair span
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Undocumented in GVF specification.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: reads
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of reads that are supporting a variant.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: score
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Score of the feature. For example, an E-value for sequence similarity features or a P-value for ab initio gene prediction features.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sequence
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: All sequence variations at a locus -- including the reference sequence when appropriate (for example, when the locus is heterozygous). If the feature is on the minus strand, then the sequence is the reverse-compliment of the reference genome for these coordinates.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sequenced individual datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with SequencedIndividual class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: set datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Set class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A free text qualifier that describes the algorithm or operating procedure that generated this feature. For example, the name of the software that generated this feature or a database name.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: tag
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Tag name of a feature attribute.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: target datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Target class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: technology platform datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with TechnologyPlatform class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: total reads
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Total number of reads.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the feature, which is either an entry the "lite" version of the Sequence Ontology (SOFA) or a child entry of sequence_feature (SO:0000110) of the full Sequence Ontology (SO).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: variant datatype property
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Properties that are directly associated with Variant class instances.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: vcf version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Version of the VCF specification that defines the feature set contents.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Attribute
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Representation of attribute tag/value pairs that are not covered by specific classes such as Effect or Variant.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Breakpoint
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the source or destination of a zero-length sequence alteration.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Chromosome
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An abstract representation of a chromosome to represent ploidy.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DataSource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Provides information about the source of the data. For example, it can link out to actual sequences associated with the Feature individuals in a Set.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DataType
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Determines the datatype of a variant sequence.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Effect
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describing the effect of a feature variant.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Enumeration
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A finite and complete set of values.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A genomic sequence feature.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: GenomicSource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An enumerated class for determining the genomic source (cell type) of sequenced data.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Landmark
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A landmark that establishes the coordinate system for features.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Method
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Information about the used scoring algorithm or method.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PhenotypeDescription
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Additional information about an individual's phenotype.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ReadType
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Type of reads obtained for a given technology platform.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reference
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describing the reference sequence of a feature.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SequencedIndividual
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Aggregated sequencing information for a particular individual.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Set
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Set of genomic sequence features, whose identifiers are unique within the set.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sex
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: For single individual sets, the Sex class' OWL-individuals can be used to specify the sex of the sequenced (real-life) individuals.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: StructuredAttribute
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Representation of attribute tag/value pairs that are specific to particular structured attributes, but which are not covered by the GVF specification.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Target
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Indicates a feature's "target" of a nucleotide-to-nucleotide or protein-to-nucleotide alignment.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TechnologyPlatform
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Details about the sequencing/microarray technology used to gather the data in a set.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Variant
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describing specific alterations of a feature.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Zygosity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Denotes the zygosity of alleles.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Female
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Denotes that a Set contains features of a female.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Germline
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Denotes that a set contains features of germline cells.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Male
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Denotes that a Set contains features of a male.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Prenatal
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Denotes that a set contains features of prenatal cells.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Somatic
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Denotes that a set contains features of somatic cells.
